submitMessage: The information contained in this form will be made available on-line to the Permanent Representation, or Mission of your country in Brussels. All applications received directly from administrations of beneficiaries will be forwarded to the EU Delegation / Office concerned for a preliminary evaluation. This application form has a validity period of two years from the date that it was submitted; TAIEX reserves the right to cancel any event that has not been implemented within the two year period.

questionList.label: Type
questionList.hint: Please select one project type of the peer-to-peer exchange (workshop, expert mission, study visit or Work from home)
Why is specifically a study visit/workshop requested instead of an expert mission/peer review mission?

questionList.label: EU service requesting the TAIEX activity

questionList.hint: Has the request been consulted with the DG NEAR geographical desk, the EU Delegation, the relevant DG NEAR Centre for Thematic Expertise, the relevant line DGs, the EEAS or any other relevant EU service?

questionList.label: Does the peer-to-peer exchange concern
questionList.hint: The implementation of one or more strategic objectives or specific provisions within the EU political/policy priorities for the country?
Implementation of specific EU or international standards and legislation?

questionList.label: What will the EU Member State public expert(s) focus on during the peer-to-peer exchange?
Target audience
questionList.hint: Specify if officials from Ministries, institutions, regulatory authorities, professional associations or other

questionList.label: Main topics/content
questionList.hint: Please list briefly (a) the issues to be discussed with the EU Member State public expert(s) and (b) the expected outputs/deliverables of the peer-to-peer exchange

questionList.label: Current situation/justification
questionList.hint: Please describe briefly the current situation related to the issue concerned and how the peer-to-peer exchange is expected to contribute to its improvement

questionList.label: Is there any planned or currently running project financed by EU funds and/or other international programmes dealing with the issues covered by the request? Has any such project been implemented in the last two years?
questionList.hint: If yes, please provide details thereof

questionList.label: Previous TAIEX and Twinning assistance?
questionList.hint: If yes, please indicate details of the previous events and the outcome of the assistance provided

questionList.label: EU service submitting the TAIEX application and beneficiary
EU
questionList.hint: Contact person for administrative questions and practical matters related to this event

questionList.label: Beneficiary
questionList.hint: Contact person for administrative questions and practical matters related to this event

questionList.label: Proposed indicative date of the exchange/event
questionList.hint: PLEASE CONSIDER THAT TAIEX REQUESTS NEED AT LEAST 3 MONTHS BEFORE BEING IMPLEMENTED

questionList.label: EU Member State public administration(s) from which you wish to receive the expertise
questionList.hint: Preferred EU Member State (choice cannot always be guaranteed), Optional
EU Member State institution (if known). Briefly explain your preference

questionList.label: Do you know the Member State expert from whom you wish to receive expertise (Optional)?
Contact person for the evaluation of the impact of TAIEX Strategic assistance
questionList.hint: (after the peer-to-peer exchange has taken place)

questionList.label: Do you agree with publication of some information related to this request on the TAIEX website?
questionList.hint: The information includes an explanation on the aim of the assistance, the beneficiary institution, the target audience, the EU legislation and the agenda

questionList.label: Add participants
questionList.hint: The data you provided will be solely used for the organisation of TAIEX events unless otherwise stated. You are entitled to have your data deleted or removed from our database at any time.
